snippet.title: Panzer Attack - (1978) - Bally Astrocade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Bally Midway © 1978
[Console] Bally Astrocade
Emulator: MAME 0.219

Here's the "Tank Game" that every system needed to have.  Now the Bally PROFESSIONAL Arcade system was so advanced for its time that the tank game would also naturally be extremely advanced for a home system -- right?  And the verdict...  crap!  It moves kind of smoothly, but the sound effects suck, the tanks are too big for a decent playfield, and this just doesn't even hold up against the Atari 2600.  I'm beginning to see why the failure of the Bally Arcade was imminent.
